lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the outcome of the Tour de France misstated the given name of the Austrian rider who finished in third place and won the polka-dot jersey as the best mountain climber. He is Bernhard Kohl, not Bernard.
snippet: An article on Monday about the outcome of the Tour de France misstated the given name of the Austrian rider who finished in third place and won the polka-dot jersey as the best mountain climber. He is Bernhard Kohl, not Bernard.
